alert.note: Alert for Issaquena (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:45PM CDT until July 13 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL EAST CARROLL...NORTHEASTERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES IN NORTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND NORTHWESTERN ISSAQUENA COUNTIES... At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oak Grove, or 12 miles west of Lake Providence, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central East Carroll, northeastern West Carroll Parishes in northeastern Louisiana and northwestern Issaquena Counties, including the following locations... Kilbourne and Forest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
